ingredients: 1  mango - peeled, seeded and diced, 1 teaspoon extra virgin olive oil,   +   1/2  red bell pepper, chopped, 2  green onion, thinly sliced, 1 tablespoon chopped cilantro, 1  lime, juiced,   +   1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 pinch cracked black pepper, 1 teaspoon honey
nutrition: Total Fat 1g 2%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 149mg 6%, Total Carbohydrate 14g 5%, Dietary Fiber 2g 7%, Total Sugars 10g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 40mg 200%, Calcium 19mg 1%, Iron 0mg 2%, Potassium 158mg 3%
